title: Can i get the lp i lost because of client problems
body: Seriously, champion queue ends and we go in the loading screen, but my loading screen doesn't load, so i close it and restart and now i can't log in, as it says that the username and password combinations are wrong. WTF, why am i going to lose 20 lp because of this. Not even fair. Now instead of 2 games in a row to get to diamond 5 series, i need to win 3. This is BS

replies.body: We have a sticky post about this current issue, but it sounds like a patch mismatch failing to update you to the current version.  Restarting your client can fix this up, otherwise I recommend downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and performing a Force Repatch to get you on the correct version.  I'm really sorry to hear about the LP loss, though, it sucks that happened and I hope these steps help.  Let me know if that works for you.
